slogan_title: Universal Layer2 Scaling Solution ready for any EVM-based Chain
slogan_desc: Goshen is an fully Ethereum-equivalent Optimistic Rollup based on a RISC-V fraud-proof system.
advantage_title: It is highly scalable, low-cost, secure and decentralized.
ad_sub_desc_1: All transaction computation is offloaded from L1, the gas fee is orders of magnitude cheaper
ad_sub_desc_3: All L2 state transitions are reproducible and verifiable on L1
ad_sub_desc_4: Fully Ethereum-equivalent, all L1 toolchain just work
faucet_title: If You Need ETH, USDT, USDC, pWING TestNet Token, Please Apply Here.
